about:
Hi, I'm **Mayank Gupta**. I hold a **B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (AI/ML) from VIT Chennai**. I am passionate about **exploring various domains of Computer Science**, with a strong focus on **Machine Learning, Large Language Models (LLMs), and Full-Stack Development**. 
 
 I have hands-on experience working with **deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow), cloud computing, and backend services**. 
 
 My recent projects involve **LLMs, chatbot development, payment gateway integrations, and Android application development**. 
Currently, I am exploring **LLM applications, distributed systems, and system design** while also enhancing my skills in **backend optimizations and API performance improvements**. 
 
 I enjoy working on **real-world projects** and continuously **learning new technologies**. Many of my projects are available on my **GitHub**.
